p: Recombinant human interferon-α (rHuIFN-α) has antiviral and immune-modulatory activity. IFN-α is active against many DNA and RNA viruses [ 98]. There are two common treatment regimens for use of rHuIFN-α in cats: SC injection (10 4 to 10 6 U/kg every 24 h) or oral application (1 to 50 U/kg every 24 h).
